OUR SERVICES

web development

is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet.

  • Content management systens
  • Virtual shops and ecommerce
  • Presentation websites
  • Online catalogues
  • Portal systems
  • & any other dynamic website

graphic design

is the process of visual communication and problem-solving using one or more of typography, photography and illustration.

  • Logo design
  • Flyers & Brochures
  • Business Cards
  • Stationery Design
  • Powerpoint presentation
  • Print Ads / Magazine
  • Banners

internet marketing

is the marketing of products or services using digital technologies, mainly on the Internet, display advertising.

  • Search engine optimisation
  • Search engine marketing
  • Internet advertising
  • Web analysis
  • Blog marketing

Awesome 5 stars support!

Whether you're an expert or a beginner, our Support Team wil do its best to provide the best possible and helpful answer for the issues that you're having.

Customer support is a range of customer services to assist customers in making cost effective and correct use of a product. It includes assistance in planning, installation, training, troubleshooting, maintenance, upgrading, and disposal of a product.

Regarding technology products such as mobile phones, televisions, computers, software products or other electronic or mechanical goods, it is termed technical support.

Multiple portfolio layouts

Your projects deserves the best showcase. Kallyas includes several highly customisable portfolio layouts for your business?s projects, so that your website visitors will actually see the amazing work you're doing.

Hero scenes

Maintenance mode

Add an extra sense of curiosity while still being connected with your audience. All by simply hiding your actual website?s content until your development process is finished and launch with whistles and bells.
